class.name: cob_twist_controller/ControllerInterfaceVelocity
class.description: A controller interface publishing target velocities as std_msgs/Float64MultiArray

class.name: cob_twist_controller/ControllerInterfacePosition
class.description: A controller interface publishing target positions as std_msgs/Float64MultiArray

class.name: cob_twist_controller/ControllerInterfaceTrajectory
class.description: A controller interface publishing target positions as trajectory_msgs/JointTrajectory

class.name: cob_twist_controller/ControllerInterfaceJointStates
class.description: A controller interface publishing target positions as sensor_msgs/JointStates
